speaker: Nina
text: I wish we had listened to the warnings from the infrastructure team.
ipa: aɪ wɪʃ wi hæd ˈlɪsənd tu ðə ˈwɔrnɪŋz frəm ði ˌɪnfrəˈstrʌktʃɚ tim.
stress: I WISH we had LISTENED to the WARNINGS from the INFRASTRUCTURE TEAM.
linking:
"had listened" → /hæd ˈlɪsənd/ (d + l linking)
"from the" → /frəm ðə/ (m + th linking)

speaker: Omar
text: Me too. We should have delayed the migration until the DNS configs were stable.
ipa: mi tu. wi ʃʊd həv dɪˈleɪd ðə maɪˈɡreɪʃən ənˈtɪl ðə ˌdiɛnɛs ˈkɑnfɪɡz wɚ ˈsteɪbəl.
stress: ME TOO. We SHOULD have DELAYED the MIGRATION until the DNS CONFIGS were STABLE.
linking:
"should have" → /ʃʊd həv/ (d + h linking)
"until the" → /ənˈtɪl ðə/ (l + th linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Yeah. If we had waited just one more day, the outage wouldn’t have affected the European region.
ipa: jæ. ɪf wi hæd ˈweɪtɪd dʒəst wʌn mɔr deɪ, ði ˈaʊtɪdʒ ˈwʊdənt həv əˈfɛktɪd ðə ˌjʊɹəˈpiən ˈɹidʒən.
stress: YEAH. If we had WAITED just ONE more DAY, the OUTAGE wouldn’t have AFFECTED the EUROPEAN REGION.
linking:
"had waited" → /hæd ˈweɪtɪd/ (d + w linking)
"wouldn’t have" → /ˈwʊdənt həv/ (t + h linking)

speaker: Omar
text: Exactly. And if I had reviewed the rollback steps earlier, we might have avoided the downtime altogether.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli. ænd ɪf aɪ hæd ɹɪˈvjud ðə ˈroʊlbæk stɛps ˈɝliɚ, wi maɪt həv əˈvɔɪdɪd ðə ˈdaʊntaɪm ˌɔltəˈɡɛðɚ.
stress: EXACTLY. And if I had REVIEWED the ROLLBACK STEPS EARLIER, we MIGHT have AVOIDED the DOWNTIME ALTOGETHER.
linking:
"had reviewed" → /hæd ɹɪˈvjud/ (d + r linking)
"might have" → /maɪt həv/ (t + h linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Honestly, I wish I had escalated the issue when I saw the weird latency spike.
ipa: ˈɑnəstli, aɪ wɪʃ aɪ hæd ˈɛskəˌleɪtɪd ði ˈɪʃu wɛn aɪ sɔ ðə wɪɹd ˈleɪtənsi spaɪk.
stress: HONESTLY, I WISH I had ESCALATED the ISSUE when I SAW the WEIRD LATENCY SPIKE.
linking:
"had escalated" → /hæd ˈɛskəˌleɪtɪd/ (d + e linking)
"when I" → /wɛn aɪ/ (n + a linking)

speaker: Omar
text: You’re not alone. We could have handled the release better if we had communicated more openly with the SREs.
ipa: jʊɹ nɑt əˈloʊn. wi kʊd həv ˈhændəld ðə ɹɪˈlis ˈbɛtɚ ɪf wi hæd kəˈmjunəˌkeɪtɪd mɔɹ ˈoʊpənli wɪð ði ˌɛsɑɹˈiz.
stress: YOU’RE NOT ALONE. We COULD have HANDLED the RELEASE BETTER if we had COMMUNICATED more OPENLY with the SREs.
linking:
"could have" → /kʊd həv/ (d + h linking)
"had communicated" → /hæd kəˈmjunəˌkeɪtɪd/ (d + c linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Right. It must have seemed chaotic from their side.
ipa: ɹaɪt. ɪt mʌst həv simd keɪˈɑtɪk frəm ðɛɹ saɪd.
stress: RIGHT. It MUST have SEEMED CHAOTIC from THEIR SIDE.
linking:
"must have" → /mʌst həv/ (t + h linking)
"from their" → /frəm ðɛɹ/ (m + th linking)

speaker: Omar
text: If only we had set clearer ownership ahead of time.
ipa: ɪf ˈoʊnli wi hæd sɛt ˈklɪɹɚ ˈoʊnɚʃɪp əˈhɛd əv taɪm.
stress: IF ONLY we had SET CLEARER OWNERSHIP AHEAD of TIME.
linking:
"had set" → /hæd sɛt/ (d + s linking)
"ahead of" → /əˈhɛd əv/ (d + o linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Lesson learned. Next time, we’ll make sure that kind of misalignment doesn’t happen again.
ipa: ˈlɛsən lɝnd. nɛkst taɪm, wil meɪk ʃʊɹ ðæt kaɪnd əv ˌmɪsəˈlaɪnmənt ˈdʌzənt ˈhæpən əˈɡɛn.
stress: LESSON LEARNED. NEXT TIME, we’ll MAKE SURE that KIND of MISALIGNMENT DOESN’T HAPPEN AGAIN.
linking:
"we’ll make" → /wil meɪk/ (l + m linking)
"doesn’t happen" → /ˈdʌzənt ˈhæpən/ (t + h linking)
